attributes.action: in light of evidence that the temperature of the Earth has not increased at all this century, reverse all tax increases ostensibly imposed because of global warming.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: New scientific reports state that the Earth although warming slightly in the last decade of the 20th century has remained the same temperature since despite emerging economies like China pumping far more CO2 in to the atmosphere. Is it not therefore time to stop using this argument to raise taxes and therefore restricting people's lifestyles.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
